title: After the Kick
description: A kicker vying for a coveted spot on his favorite football team. A gender breaking challenger who could make history. Does their love stand a chance, or should they just drop back and punt?Cooper Inman’s brothers were all great quarterbacks, but he lacks the height and stature for the position. Determined to play in the NFL anyway, he bets all his chips on a career as a kicker. But he has to make the final cut first.Mary Claire Reynolds comes to the NFL after shattering kicking records during her college career. She’s just as qualified as any of the male kickers, but still faces backlash for being a female.Cooper and Mary Claire develop feelings for each other when they start out on the same team. But will they be able to keep the relationship kickin’ after final cuts?You’ll love After the Kick if you’re a fan of clean and inspirational reads, sports romances, and happily ever afters.
author: Savannah Adams
